casebody.data:
RUCKER v. COCO-COLA CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. October 21, 1902.) No. 1,161. In Error to the Circuit Court of the United States for the Northern District of Georgia. E. A. Angier and Geo. L. Bell, for plaintiff in error. Reuben R. Arnold, for defendant in error.

Before PARDEE, McCORMICK, and SHELBY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the circuit court is affirmed.
